channel.title: Content on bradorego.com
channel.description: Recent content in Content on bradorego.com

item.title: Back to Static
item.description: TL;DNR Static generators (e.g. Hugo) are pretty cool. Ease of use/production directly relates to content creation. It's okay to borrow aesthetics/technologies/designs from others. As you might be able to tell, my last blog post is from 2014. It was about time to get back on the blog horse but also give the site a little facelift. I’d migrated blog platforms in the past, but never really took the time to think about how my own personal site was hosted.

item.title: The Importance of Content
item.description: TL;DNR Content is just as important to UX as aesthetics. Without content, your site (and all of its functionality and pretty design) is worthless. Trying to stay up to date with blog posts is hard. I’m going to say this straight out of the gates: this blog post is kind of a cop-out. There have been a ton of changes in my life lately, so I’ve been a little MIA when it comes to this blog.
